# Introduction

## Introduction

This is a Quarto presentation template with UM elements

# Options

## Aspect ratio

To use the wider aspect ratio of 16:9 (default), set
``` yaml
format:
  um-presentation-beamer:
    aspectratio: 169
    titlegraphic: bg-wide.jpg
```

To use the aspect ratio of 4:3, set
``` yaml
format:
  um-presentation-beamer:
    aspectratio: 43
    titlegraphic: bg.jpg
```


## Other options

- `toc: false`
- `titlefontsize: 20pt`
- `fontsize: 14pt`
- `date-format: "D MMMM YYYY"`
